mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dadoc_challenger (num, id, challengeTitle, period, stamp, success) VALUES(challenger_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{challengeTitle}, #{period}, 0, 'false')
mapper.select: SELECT dadoc_challenger.num, id, challengeTitle, dadoc_challenger.period, startDate, endDate FROM dadoc_challenger INNER JOIN dadoc_challenges ON dadoc_challenger.challengeTitle=dadoc_challenges.title WHERE id =#{id}
